items.title: The Hackett GroupÂ® Announces Winners of the 2025 Hackett Innovation Awards
items.description: MIAMI, June 30, 2025--The Hackett Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: HCKT), a leading generative artificial intelligence (Gen AI) consultancy and executive advisory firm, today announced the winners of its inaugural Hackett Innovation Awards, which recognize companies that are using artificial intelligence (AI) to transform their end-to-end business process performance. These companies have successfully infused AI into a wide range of end-to-end business processes.

items.title: US FDA to revise ADHD stimulants labels to warn of weight loss risk in children under 6
items.description: The U.S. Food and DrugAdministration said on Monday it is revising the labeling of allextended-release stimulants used to treat attention-deficithyperactivity disorder to include warnings about the...
